name: Bloons (itch)
description:
Created solo as part of Ludum Dare 50.

There are balloons. You have a paddle. When 3 balloons hit the floor you're out. How long can you delay the inevitable? Find out in this short hyper-casual game about keeping balloons off the ground. 

Compatible with most controllers to mouse and keyboard.  It is recommended that you maximize the game for the best experience.
